titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes most excellent Maiestie being credibly enformed that many vagabonds, rogues, idle persons, and masterlesse men hauing nothing to liue on, doe dayly resort to the cities of London and Westminster, and to the suburbs of the same ...
Proclamations. 1579-01-31
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes most excellent Maiestie being credibly enformed that many vagabonds, rogues, idle persons, and masterlesse men hauing nothing to liue on, doe dayly resort to the cities of London and Westminster, and to the suburbs of the same ...
Proclamations. 1579-01-31
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes Maiestie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: Actual printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
Proclamation dated: "the xxxj. day of Ianuary 1578".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
